translations: v.慢慢倒出（酒等液体）；（非正式）卸客；（把液体，尤指酒）倒入（decant 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 倾析, 倒灌, 倾注滤, 特意氧化
澄清罐, 滗析槽, 澄清槽, 翻译
离心机, 沉降式离心分离机

sentences.sentence: If they get worse after decanting the wine is probably corked.
sentences.translation: 如果在醒酒之后状况变得更糟了，这支酒很可能是有瓶塞味儿了。

sentences.sentence: Just remember to shake your make-up remover before decanting it.
sentences.translation: 一定要记得，在倒卸妆液的时候，先把它摇匀。

sentences.sentence: Just remember to shake your make-up remover (if it contains oils) before decanting it.
sentences.translation: 一定要记得，在倒卸妆液的时候(如果是油质卸妆液的话)，先把它摇匀。
